entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Make target value dynamic for iOS in CLRTest.Execute.Bash.targets #59185
    7.0.0
  • [Blazor WebAssembly] Console.Write does not write anything until a new line is written #59184
  • XmlSerializer tries to use Reflection.Emit even if RuntimeFeature.IsDynamicCodeSupported is false #59167
  • Running a .NET 5 project on macOS M1 with .NET 6 leads to confusing error message #59168
  • 6.0 RC1: ImplicitUsings with .NET Framework 4.x - System.Net.Http is not available #59163
  • DOTNET_SYSTEM_NET_SOCKETS_INLINE_COMPLETIONS and UnsafePreferInlineScheduling Support #59157
  • [macOS] Potential regression in delegates invocation #59152
  • How to get property return type? #59175
  • After updating to .net6-rc1 Blazor WebAssembly's old project is not loading and new project can't build #59156
    6.0.0
  • [macOS] Potential perf regression in Timer #59150
    7.0.0
  • Potential performance regression in Array.Sort for arrays of reference types #59149
  • library_mono.js triggers apparent false-positive report from GitHub's codeql scan #59147
    6.0.0
  • Potential perf regression in Utf8Encoding.GetBytes #59146
  • Surprising performance regression on Unix VMs #59145
    6.0.0
  • Hosting .NET Core using nethost and hostfxr - Problem linking with libnethost.lib #59143
  • Creating StringBuilder with large initial capacity has regressed #59142
  • System.Text.Json source generator fails when targetting multiple frameworks without referencing STJ #59140
  • Missing XmlSerializers.dll in nupkg [Microsoft.XmlSerializer.Generator] #59139

Closed

  • CS8714: Dictionary<TKey, TValue> where TKey: notnull - WHY? #59179
  • System.IO.Pipelines.Pipe.ReadAsync fails to cancel on CancellationToken #58909
  • System - Undoc 6.0 APIs #54882
    6.0.0
  • Add `DateOnly` and `TimeOnly` string body parameter support #59118
  • Crossgen2 perfmap format version support #58468
    6.0.0
  • Referencing OpenTK.Graphics crashes the Ready2Run build. #59138
    6.0.0
  • ASP.NET 6 RC1 - On Cloudflare Pages - When I try to install 'wasm-tools' the build breaks. #59170
    7.0.0
  • .NET 6.0 RC 1 SDK does not install correctly on Windows 10. #59176
  • GZipStream silently returns corrupted data on decompression. #59171
  • Microsoft.Extensions packages missing .NET (Core) targets #59158
  • [release/6.0] Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Abstractions includes unnecessary dependencies #59161
    6.0.0
  • [wasm] Avoid unnecessary linking after `Build`, when publishing from VS #58973
    6.0.0
  • X509Certificate2.GetNameInfo(SimpleName) with non-ASCII data on Linux returns oddly encoded results. #59105
    7.0.0
  • X509Chain.Build() fails to create a valid certificate chain on Linux if two root certificates with the same subject name is added to the ExtraStore. #59148
  • WinHttp tests with Tls 1.3 are failing #58587
    6.0.0
  • Multi-targeting strategy for Json and Logging Source Generators for 6.0 NuGet packages #58536
    6.0.0
  • If you build with trimming enabled, future builds with it disabled will produce incorrect output #53612
    6.0.0
  • Cannot AOT compile with trimming disabled #53804
    6.0.0
  • .NET 6.0 does not support OLEDB #58795
  • Using Sync Method of HTTP Client (.NET 5) in .NET Framework 4.8 #59144
    7.0.0
  • ArPow stage 2: implementing source-build CI #54573
    6.0.0
  • ProcessStartInfo.Arguments follows Windows conventions on all platforms #29857
    Future
  • Process.Start doesn't work in . Net5 #59124
  • Hosting .NET Core using nethost and hostfxr - Finding nethost.dll on client machine #59082
    Future
  • Assertion failed 'varTypeIsSIMD(user) && (returnType == user->TypeGet())' #58897
    7.0.0
  • OSArchitecture is wrong on non-Windows #58463
  • Incorrect OS architecture reported for x86 code running on ARM64 #26612
    6.0.0
  • Add analyzer: Call async methods when in an async method #45661
    6.0.0
  • WindowsIdentity.RunImpersonated sending wrong credentials #58033
    7.0.0
  • Different results .Net 5.0 and .Net 6.0 on AES Crypto #59121
  • directory.getfiles does not take advantage of the index #59126
  • Uncorrect output on my PC on C# language #59125
  • EncryptedXml.Encrypt(XmlElement, X509Certificate) does not support rsa oaep, only insecure rsa1.5 #59127
  • Consider incrementing the assembly version for source generator with each build #58274
    6.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Fix race condition with cancellation tokens in Read/Flush operations #59189
    area-System.IO.Pipelines
  • Fix BinSkim warnings in System.IO.Compression.Native.dll #59188
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Arm: Use correct form of store instruction when data is float #59187
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add initial regex source generator #59186
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [docs] Add instructions for debugging native runtime code on Android #59183
    documentation, area-Build-mono
  • [mono] Remove some of the restrictions on constrained calls from #59182
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [main] WasmAppBuilder: publish only once per target framework … #59181
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1364506 #59180
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Rocky Linux support #59178
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Create and publish missing symbols #59174
    area-Build-mono, 6.0.0
  • Implement UriCreationOptions #59173
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Require UTF8 encoding in GetX509NameInfo #59172
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security
  • Failing test for DI's site call factory cache #59164
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • [release/6.0] Create a parent CMake project for building app bundles on CI #59154
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm] Add support for native relinking after Build, and… #59153
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • support FEATURE_INTERPRETER on linux-x64 #59137
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update area-owners.md #59131
    area-Meta

Merged

  • Fix race condition with cancellation tokens in Read/Flush operations #59090
    area-System.IO.Pipelines
  • Update the branding to GA #59102
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Harden native gate thread against affinity mask growth #59129
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0 #59113
  • [main] Set the publishing infra version to 3 #59165
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Change channel passed to ci_setup to track runtime branch #59070
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix environment variable using syntax for powershell #59169
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/6.0] Emit diagnostics & exceptions for sourcegen handling init-only properties & JsonInclude attributes #59097
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Set the publishing infra version to 3 #59166
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix StackOverflowException in Crossgen2 when assemblies has circular … #58268
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: simple VN budget stress mode #59051
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Merge main into feature/use-dllimport-generator #59119
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/6.0] fix TLS 1.3 in WinHttpHandler #59159
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Add SetLastError to GdiPlus methods #59151
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Drawing
  • [release/6.0] Avoid not live built packages dependencies that are satisifed by the shared framework in M.E.Logging.Abstractions #59162
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Logging, 6.0.0
  • Runtime changes for DetectPreviewFeaturesAnalyzer #59062
    area-System.Runtime
  • [release/6.0] Harden native gate thread against affinity mask growth #59132
    area-System.Threading, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Multi-target Json and Logger Source Generators between Roslyn v3.11 and v4.0 (#58446) #59074
    Servicing-approved, area-Meta
  • Remove exception messages from resource strings #59104
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Don't force using the system libunwind for source-build #58911
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] fix SendAsync from impersonificated context with default credentials #59155
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, 6.0.0
  • Create and publish missing symbols #58866
    area-Build-mono
  • disable tests unstable on Windows 11 #59135
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Require UTF8 encoding in GetX509NameInfo #59116
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Add dependency graph viewer tool #55304
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [Tell-mode][release/6.0] Use arcade power source build infra #59108
    area-Infrastructure
  • Arm64: Fix perfscore and display logic for LARGELDC #59134
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • fix SendAsync from impersonificated context with default credentials #58922
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [release/6.0] WasmAppBuilder: publish only once per target framework instead of invoking publish explicitly. #59136
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0] [mono] Update attribute name used for controlling frame pointer elimination #59091
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [release/6.0][wasm] Add support for native relinking after Build, and AOT after publish #58913
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Add SetLastError to GdiPlus methods #59096
    area-System.Drawing
  • [mono] Remove duplicates from the AOT data blob. #58982
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [release/6.0] Use caching ConsoleStream for both iOS and Android #59088
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Console, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] [mono] Use SROA-friendly struct type declarations #59060
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono, 6.0.0
  • Relax assert to check for simd8 or return type #58966
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Initialize compCurBB during fgInsertGCPoll #57334
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Remove SupportedOSPlatforms windows on Hosting WindowsServices #59064
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Change back superpmi benchmarks build to net6.0 #59130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Increment source generator assembly versions with every build #58919
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries

Updated

  • Handle file-scoped namespaces (#57894) #59100
    Servicing-consider, area-Extensions-Logging
  • Update source-gen APIs according to review #59042
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Single-file apps should not use copy-on-write mapping of the .exe on windows. #59033
    area-Single-File
  • Use XHarnessAppBundleToTest to create helix work items when runtime tests run on iOS and tvOS #58870
  • stress test sandboxing #57653
    * NO MERGE *, NO REVIEW
  • Src gen: use GetBestTypeByMetadataName instead of GetTypeByMetadataName #59092
    6.0.0
  • Change channel passed to ci_setup to track runtime branch #59071
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0] Align preallocationSize behavior #59078
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.IO, 6.0.0
  • [wasm] WebSocket improve send/receive buffers #58199
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net
  • Retrieve dumps from stress pipeline #58860
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Search native code in all R2R ni.dll in version bubble #57277
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • DO NOT MERGE: Macos builds on perf measurement pool #58514
    * NO MERGE *
  • Fix corner-case handling of cancellation exception in ForEachAsync #59065
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, 6.0.0
  • Mark time trigger #58261
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Expose cross-platform helpers for Vector64, Vector128, and Vector256 #53450
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Move optdata and version file generation up to MSBuild from build-runtime #58674
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Expose nint/nuint overloads for BitOperations #58733
    area-System.Numerics
  • Faster wasm runtime #51458
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • MonoAOTCompiler: detect when nothing has changed, and skip any precompiling #58979
    area-Build-mono
  • Universal arm crossgen compiler #58279
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Rev Alpine WithNode from 3.9 to 3.13 #57324
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution, 6.0.0
  • CI matrix change: Add OSX 12 arm #59085
  • CI matrix change: drop OSX 10.13 #59084
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • CI matrix change: Windows #58989
  • CI matrix change: debian+centos+sles #58988
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [MonoVM] Reduce P/Invoke GC transition asserts in release builds #59029
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • CI matrix change: ubuntu #58987
  • Process.Unix: handle ETXTBSY error when executing file that was just written by .NET. #59079
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Use unsigned casts for array/Span indexers #57970
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • removed argument requestId from loopbackserver.cs #58678
    area-System.Net
  • Fix setting creation date for OSX-like platforms #49555
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Use getpwuid(3) in corehost for the $HOME-less user #59036
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • 1388 xml serializer assembly load context awareness #58932
    area-Serialization, 6.0.0
  • Fix ro segments with regions #58811
    area-GC-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • msbuild silently ignores pack import, if the expected version of the pack is not found #21032
    6.0.2xx
  • dotnet workload update behaves badly #21031
    6.0.1xx
  • Parsing CSV (TextFieldParser) from ZipArchive fails with .net 6 RC1. #21030
  • help usage text missing workload #21009

Closed

  • JsonSourceGenerator cannot be created in VS2019 preview #21006
  • Global tools shim signing is lost when tool is updated #19663
    6.0.1xx
  • Clean up setting DOTNET_SKIP_FIRST_TIME_EXPERIENCE in script #10195
    Backlog
  • Add System.Net.Http and System.IO.Compression back to .NET Framework implicit references once MSBuild bug is fixed #594
  • Support multi-targeting for Roslyn components #20355
    6.0.1xx
  • File scoped namespace is not generated anymore in .Net 6 RC1 #21016

PullRequests

Created

  • Update branding for 6.0.1xx branch #21033
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Rocky Linux support #21029
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update ShowMissingWorkloads for IPA VS top level workloads #21027
    Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/5.0.4xx' => 'main' #21025
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update BlazorWebAssembly targets to work with updated wasm targets #21022
    Area-AspNetCore

Merged

  • remove unused env var: `DOTNET_SKIP_FIRST_TIME_EXPERIENCE` #20955
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the target framework for the test projects #20979
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Pass in position to .GetSuggestions() #20852
  • Update Microsoft.NET.Sdk.BeforeCommon.targets #20809
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0.4xx #20995
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Only throw missing reference path error when running with references #20990
    Area-Compatibility
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Update BlazorWebAssembly targets to work with updated wasm targets #20742
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [Backport] [Blazor] Allow duplicates in resolved files to publish (#20961) #20988
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1.1xx #20997
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1.4xx #20998
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Adding retries to nuget package downloader #20727
    Area-Workloads
  • Test winrtcomponents #19635
    Area-DotNet Test
  • Update a bunch of test projects to the current target framework #20148
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Allow specifying url for workload rollback #20991
    Area-Workloads
  • Fix nuget config not being honored #20930
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Warn when Targeting net6.0 with 16.11 and the 6.0 SDK #20987
    Servicing-consider, Area-NetSDK
  • Add a static cache for GetAssemblyVersion #20993
    Area-NetSDK
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0.2xx #20996
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix EnableTrimAnalyzer for TFMs < 6.0 #20937
    Area-ILLink

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Documentation comments on partial methods #5193

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove broken link #5192

Updated

  • Create using-alias-types.md #5174

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Inline-rename should remember the choices i made the last time i ran the feature. #56417
  • If I'm pressing Ctrl+k+d it not working in a list sub item. Please take a look in given image. Please try with same initialization. #56415
    Backlog
  • SyntaxFactory.ForStatement has incorrect nullable annotations #56414
    17.1
  • Compilation fails when using module initializers and DebugType:pdbonly #56412
    17.0
  • File scoped namespace is not generated anymore in .Net 6 RC1 #56410
    17.0
  • Add Usings: for Project and Solution #56409
    Backlog
  • Unexpected value 'FunctionType' of type 'Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.ConversionKind' in .NET 6 RC1 (works in .NET 5.0) #56407
    17.0

Closed

  • Navigate backwards is broken #55762
    17.0
  • class diagram show as collection association not working for IList<T> and T is in the same project #37796
    Backlog
  • Assigning to readonly field in constructor and getting warned for not assigning #31896
    Backlog
  • C# code format for linq should with an indent #32082
    Backlog
  • Unexpected errors are reported when type imported from metadata implements interface property in way that doesn't follow C# language rules #33256
    Compiler.Next
  • "ctor" snippet doesn't replace placeholder with class name #33417
    Backlog
  • More Identifier Colours #33620
    Backlog
  • VS 2019 VB editor is very slow #34815
    Backlog
  • 2019 VS C# and VB expression evaluator is needed in future VS versions #35003
    Backlog
  • 'NullReferenceException' occurs when getting 'Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.TypeInfo' #35261
    Compiler.Next
  • Ongoing IDE error messages in VS 2019 for valid code. #35363
    Backlog
  • Getting IDE0008 while casting to an obvious type #35417
    Backlog
  • No add reference option #35420
    Backlog
  • Roslyn compilation doesnt go hand-in-hand with MSBuild #35485
    Backlog
  • Automated Code Snippets #35811
    Backlog
  • Formatting of comments with Dotnet Format #36069
    Backlog
  • Add comments to end statement #36961
    Backlog
  • Working on compiler code in Roslyn.sln is slow #36980
    Backlog
  • Condition #IF DEBUG #37007
    Backlog
  • Microsoft.CSharp.Core.targets(59,5): error MSB6006 docker build failed on windows server 2016 core image #37098
    Compiler.Next
  • Intellisense not showing when named arguments are inserted #37436
    Backlog
  • Remote Debugging C# & ability to view windows forms #37724
  • Correctly select C# string literal on double-click #37835
    Backlog
  • Collapse very long parameter lists #38012
    Backlog
  • null exception on HaveSameReturnTypes #38317
    Compiler.Next
  • Why you can not wrap a select case? #38530
    Backlog
  • CSharpRemoveUnusedValuesCodeFixProvider crashes when refactoring #39160
    Backlog
  • C# Auto Format not working #39175
    Backlog
  • error MSB6006: "csc.dll" exited with code 137 #39276
  • If I'm trying to reference a new class, property, etc. that only newer frameworks/standard/core target, some helpful refactor recommendations would be nice. I find I spend a lot of time trying to understand when given features came in for what version.... #39332
    Backlog
  • Add build warning if component does not have Parameter defined #39821
    Backlog
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Formatting.Formatter don't use NewLineForMembersInObjectInit option #39837
    Backlog
  • Visual Studio crashes on code analysis of a large file #39842
  • C# editor: tooltip for extension lacks info #39933
    Backlog
  • Unhandled System.OperationCanceledException #40032
    Backlog
  • Visual Studio 2019 intellisense doesn't work on projects created with VS 2017 #40192
    Backlog
  • EditorConfig - Keep case statement on same line #40799
    Backlog
  • Add the ability to find user changes to Analyser ruleset. #41544
    Backlog
  • Visual enhancement about nano generation operation #41885
    Backlog
  • Do not show "Gathering Suggestions" during rename tracking #42050
    Backlog
  • LanguageServices.CSharp.UnitTests tests are crashing and causing build flakiness #42588
    Backlog
  • Merge code and document while decompile C# library #42730
    Backlog
  • combined length of user strings used by the program exceeds allowed limit #42828
  • CS0162 (unreachable code) incorrect code fix suggested #43257
    Backlog
  • Exception GetSemanticModelAsync().Result : One or more errors occurred. (Object reference not set to an instance of an object.) #43679
    Backlog
  • Analyzer for the nameof expression instead of using the typeof(SomeType).Name #44162
    Backlog
  • Add Parameter - Support range variables when inferring callsites. #44689
    Backlog
  • Code fixes and refactorings should respect the code style / formatting I set in my EditorConfig #44711
    Backlog
  • Declaration to suppress backward compatibility #45027
    Backlog
  • Outlining mode no longer works #45359
    Backlog
  • Can Visual Studio customize the development code? #46270
    Backlog
  • VS2019 doesn’t want to respect my solution’s .editorconfig’s C# tab settings when it auto formats code #47396
    Backlog
  • Convert to Full Property with option for Backing Variable or MyBase #47441
    Backlog
  • When copy and pasting a file into Solution... #47795
    Backlog
  • Code Cleanup option #47799
    Backlog
  • Dynamic order of light bulb menu's causes loss of productivity #48385
    Backlog
  • NullReferenceException when updating from 3.3.1 to 3.4.0 #48470
    Backlog
  • Should warn on property accessor call on in parameter #49456
    Backlog
  • ServiceHub.RoslynCodeAnalysisService.exe requested process termination through `System.Environment.FailFast` #49477
    Backlog
  • The new ! postfix operator generates incorrect warnings #49620
    Backlog
  • Callback References #49928
    Backlog
  • Select the first member !!! #49930
    Backlog
  • snippets for `else` to automatically add a new line #50335
    Backlog
  • Emit more compact IL for floating point constants #50571
    Backlog
  • .editorconfig doesn't match files if {} pattern includes only single entry #50641
    17.0
  • Get current solution as variable, without giving its solution path #50687
    Backlog
  • Target compiler with net5.0 to cover NRT issues with LINQ #50822
    17.1
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Common package dependencies are superfluous #50832
  • Needs Review: Proposal: Emitting compiler details #50978
  • IntelliSense reporting errors for old c# version 5 and version 6 when build is configured to c# version 7.3 #51023
  • Add compiler flag to implicitly put source generated files in an unsafe context. #51154
  • Quick action to refactoring Interpolation string to string.Format #51156
    Backlog
  • Resolvable overload ambiguousness #51232
  • Refactoring that converts a Class to a Record #51412
    Backlog
  • Add possibility to Extract Function to Lambda Function with Refactoring #51486
    Backlog
  • Green highlight over entire C# document #51626
    Backlog
  • dotnet_style_null_propagation = true:suggestion reporting a warning #51849
    Backlog
  • Build failed, MSB6006: csc.dll exited with code 139 on Ubuntu ARM64 #51861
  • How to declare all CS* warnings as errors within .editorconfig #52051
  • Have Tools->Options consume the new settings provider infrastructure #52736
    Backlog
  • Many instances of the same error at the end of app building #52758
  • Inline parameter hints overlap with the debugger continue icon #53233
    Backlog
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Common v.1.1.1 causes duplicate references in MSI project #53297
    Backlog
  • CS1069: The type name 'Queue<>' could not be found in the namespace 'System.Collections.Generic'. #53366
  • Smart Break Line adds braces in the 'if' block when invoked from 'else' #53453
    Backlog
  • The custom analyzer can only take effect once #53454
    Backlog
  • Automatic reload of .editorconfig when it is updated #53556
  • For methods and fields in C#, set the scope to protected for unless class is sealed #53560
  • TODO List empty after movingfrom VB Express 2015 to VS 2019 #53882
    Backlog
  • Error for "analyzer assembly not present" could be clearer #53944
  • Rename 'show potential fixes' bug #54030
    Backlog
  • CS0652 should occur for more integer inequalities #54140
    Backlog
  • Introduce constant for all occurrences not working #54260
    Backlog
  • Well-known type members' descriptors initialization code quality #54668
  • Any source generator doesn't work when using external classes that are defined out of a project having the source generator itself #55310
  • Improve CS0106 for the different cases where it can happen #55634
  • Add public API to retrieve metadata token from ISymbol #53486
  • Test issue please ignore #56423
  • Granular Source Generator APIs #51257
    17.0
  • Cannot use `ptr is null` for `T* where T : unmanaged` #48591
    17.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove legacy RPC #56426
    Area-IDE
  • Add reproducer for pattern matching crash #56425
    Area-Compilers
  • EnC/HR interface unification #56424
    Area-Interactive
  • Fix nullable annotations #56422
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix partial method doc comments #56419
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix cases where we were showing 'nint/nuint' in preprocessor directives. #56418
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to publish views of a Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Web project #36583
  • [HotReload][BlazorWASM]: Adding an attribute to InputSelect results in a rude edit #36582
  • `dotnet workload install wasm-tools` Fails #36581
  • `dotnet watch` with `aot` leads to unexpected behavior #36579
  • Missing .msg extension in FileExtensionContentTypeProvider #36576
  • Allow SignalR to work in AWS serverless environment #36575
  • InputFile component has two onchange event handlers #36573
  • Blazor Server .NET 6 new project template issues #36572
  • Components that mirror HTML elements cause invalid errors #36569
    17.0-Preview5
  • Components that mirror HTML elements don't auto-close correctly. #36568
    17.0-Preview5
  • Startup improvement: plaintext #36567
  • Startup regression: fortunes_dapper #36566
  • MVC actions returning Problem Details should return the standard media type for Problem Details responses #36560
    6.0-rc2
  • Minimal APIs should return the standard media type for Problem Details responses #36557
    6.0-rc2
  • CSS error does not get remapped properly #36556
    17.0-Preview5
  • ngen O# assemblies #36554
    17.0-Preview5
  • Rename "DelegateEndpoint" types #36553
    6.0-rc2
  • Building a 5.0 app with 6.0 SDK in VS 2019 causes analyzers to fail to load #36552
  • VS2022 Razor editor incorrect completion with bind-Val #36550
  • W3C Logger monthly / custom naming #36544
    .NET 7 Planning
  • UseHttpsRedirection breaks cors #36542
  • NET 6 RC1 Blazor Wasm SignalR WebSockets authentication fails. #36541
  • 404 with `_content/Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.CustomElements/BlazorCustomElements.js` #36539
    6.0.0
  • app.UseWebAssemblyDebugging() returns Method not found after update from 6.0 preview 7 to 6.0 RC 1 #36538
  • Avoid invocation of subsequent AuthorizationHandlers for a single Requirement #36536
  • Blazor Server - Cannot find the fallback endpoint specified by route values: { page: /_Host, area: } exception with RC1 #36535
  • Release notes for packages such as Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.AzureAppServices #36532
  • Startup regression: connectionclosehttps #36531
  • Route constraints don't produce appropriate information in OpenAPI schema #36525
  • role based routing support #36524
  • Support nullable structs with TryParse in RequestDelegateFactory #36523

Closed

  • `dotnet run -p:Configuration=Release` looks for assets in `bin/Debug` #36521
    6.0-rc2
  • Semantic tokens experience improvements aka "Project Palette" #33200
    17.0-Preview5
  • [Blazor .Net 6 RC1] PreRender: Has ComponentApplicationState been renamed/changed namespace? #36507
  • 🐞 The `WebApplicationBuilder.Configuration` add custom configuration provider was called more than once. #36452
    6.0-rc2
  • Re-enable Win7 tests once dotnet restore hangs are resolved #32683
  • error MSB3073 during build from command line #33771
  • Remove CS1705 workarounds #31075
  • Perf regression: connectionclose #36530
  • Ignore #36551
  • Hot reload error on rc1 on VS or dotnet watch #36533
  • .Net Core 6 RC1 Blazor HotReload stops working after specific HTML update #36528
  • Ensure WASM native asset support is merged for RC2 #36333
    6.0-rc2
  • Avoid duplicates in automatically generated endpoint names #36487
    6.0-rc2
  • X-Forwarded-For header parsing error and invalid fallback to reverse proxy IP #36537
  • Cannot inspect parameter attributes in API Explorer with Minimal Actions #36438
    6.0-rc2
  • Blazor RunAOTCompilation fails during BlazorWebAssembly.ComputeBlazorPublishAssets.Execute #35633
    6.0-rc2
  • [Flaky test] Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Razor.Tests.StaticWebAssetsIntegrationTest.Publish_WithBuildReferencesDisabled_CopiesStaticWebAssetsToDestinationFolder #30245
  • Blazor script security problems RC1 #36529
  • [Blazor-wasm] Continuation of: Lazy loading of application areas #5465 #36493
  • Startup improvement: json #36445
  • Cannot find the fallback endpoint specified by route values: { page: /_Host, area: }. #36453
    6.0-rc2
  • Repeatable crash with specific Razor text edit #27667
    17.0-Preview5

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Add support for BindAsync without ParameterInfo #36580
  • [release/6.0] Rename and consolidate "DelegateEndpoint" types #36578
    area-runtime
  • Stabilize versions for 6.0.0 RTM #36571
    blocked, area-infrastructure
  • [main] Update SiteExtension versions #36565
    area-infrastructure
  • Revert "[release/5.0] Disable OSX10.14 Helix jobs for now" #36564
    area-infrastructure, 5.1.12
  • Set bootstrap5 for default static assets #36561
    area-identity
  • [release/5.0] Use ArrayPool as default pool fallback #36559
    area-runtime
  • [release/6.0] Update SiteExtension versions #36558
    area-infrastructure
  • Fixup OpenAPI displayed param type when using TryParse #36555
    area-mvc, area-web-frameworks
  • [release/6.0] Avoid using TargetFramework in build targets #36545
    area-mvc
  • Fixup OpenAPI displayed param type when using TryParse #36526
    area-mvc, area-web-frameworks

Merged

  • Make DelegateEndpointConventionBuilder constructors public (#36492) #36549
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Expose ParameterInfo for Minimal Actions API Explorer (#36439) #36547

  • Revert "[release/6.0] Disable OSX10.14 Helix jobs for now" #36562

  • Revert setting endpoint name automatically (#36518) #36548
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview1
  • Avoid building the configuration sources twice #36570
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0 #36516
    area-infrastructure
  • Revert "Disable OSX10.14 Helix jobs for now" #36563
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Fix up solution file #36383
    area-infrastructure, 6.0-rc2
  • Check for duplicate endpoint names on startup #36353
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Expose ParameterInfo for Minimal Actions API Explorer #36439

  • Avoid using TargetFramework in build targets #36512
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview1

    3.1.20
  • Don't ignore XML doc warnings for Polly #36485
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Quarantine failing test #36473
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Stop using unencrypted git protocol in build.gradle #36476
    area-signalr, 6.0-rc2

Updated

  • Use minimal APIs for F# project templates #35833

  • Dougbu/check.solution.filters #36449

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Update .NET MAUI Blazor template to align with content in the latest .NET 6 Blazor templates #2507
  • How does the new Maui Blazor Template can run on Windows? #2506
  • [Bug] Hot reload on Blazor: StateHasChanged may not being executed #2503
  • Error APT2067 failed processing manifest #2500
    6.0.101-preview.9
  • [Bug] .NET 6.0 RC 1 MAUI workloads update failed. #2499
  • The RuntimeIdentifier 'iossimulator-x64' is invalid. #2495
  • [Bug] Button CornerRadius not working #2494
  • [Bug] Debug for Windows App Fails Deploment: Need recipe file #2493
  • [Bug] The IDE has some errors after using the template to create the MAUI project #2490
  • [Bug] Visual Studio 2022 Preview 4 shows old MAUI templates #2489

Closed

  • RowHeight stays when content is hidden #2338
  • [Bug] Updating existing elements margin via code-behind does not update views. #2443
  • [Bug] Null Reference Exception when initializing ScrollView with no content. #2462
  • Update AzDO build agents to have VS2022 #2473
  • How to reference the application window to set properties like height/width/etc? (.NET MAUI Blazor) #2487
  • [Bug] System.Exception: 'Handler not found for view Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Compatibility.RelativeLayout.' #2335

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge all the .NET 6 projects/solutions #2505
  • Update WebView2 to 1.0.961.33 #2504
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [workload] rename Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Sdk #2502
  • More Source Generators #2501
  • Update to preview versioning scheme #2497
  • [android] add AOT profile for .NET MAUI #2496
  • Use Essentials over the old Device class #2488

Merged

  • Call IView.InvalidateMeasure from VisualElement.InvalidateMeasureInternal #2498
  • Return Size.Zero from measure when ScrollView Content is null #2486
  • [workload] create $(MauiVersion) property #2282
  • Remove Local Property #2479
  • Add extension method for modifying an existing mapping. #2458
  • Remove dotnet core build update #2482

Updated

  • Shadow Support #570
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • Update template so you can find it under Windows as well #2484

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Review and refactor how dependencies are stored and exposed in `StateManager` #26052
  • Data and index compression #26049
  • Query: Add entry point in queryable method translating expression visitor #26048
  • Temporal tables tests are broken #26047
    6.0.0
  • Problems with GroupBy #26046
    6.0.0
  • [RC1] Invalid migrations snapshot generated for key Fluent APIs #26045
  • Spatial NetTopologySuite - Docker Image - SQLite Error 1: 'mod_spatialite.so: cannot open shared object #26043
  • Get an entity with select for update #26042
  • Option to configure all tables in the model as temporal #26041
  • Ensure temporal tables tests run on PRs/C.I. #26040
    MQ
  • EF Core save built model for subsequent startup #26038
  • Query: DefaultIfEmpty for CLR DateTime which is SQL datetime returns SQL datetime2 default value #26037

Closed

  • Migrations/Temporal Tables: null value exception when executing Down migration to convert entity from temporal to normal #26014
    6.0.0
  • Migration Bundles: Flow configuration from project #25906
    6.0.0-rc2
  • EF Core 6 RC1 breaks extensions due to a change in a contract #26022
  • Sharing of transaction fails on execution strategy retry #25946
    6.0.0-rc2

PullRequests

Created

  • Query: Fix temporal table tests #26056
  • Update helix.proj #26055
  • Query: Translate ToList over grouping element #26054
  • Stabilize versions for 6.0.0 RTM #26051
    blocked, area-infrastructure
  • Query: Throw better error message when final result contains IGrouping #26050
  • Detect relationship changes when replacing an entity with a different instance #26036

Merged

  • Fix to #26014 - Migrations/Temporal Tables: null value exception when executing Down migration to convert entity from temporal to normal #26053
  • Bundles: Flow configuration from project #26044
  • Update to 3.1.119 SDK and 2.1.30 runtime #26034
  • Update to 5.0.7 SDK and 3.1.19 runtimes #26035
  • Allow UseTransaction to replace existing transaction #25979

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #26026
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/3.1' => 'main' #26033
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/5.0' => 'main' #26032
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
